entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
